sentences.sContent: The importance of predation as an exploitation strategy may be summarized under four main categories.
sentences.sContent_eng: The importance of predation as an exploitation strategy may be summarized under four main categories.
sentences.sCn: 捕食作用作为一种掠夺性的对策其重要意义可归纳为四个主要方面。

words.tran: 掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的
[动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者
